## succeeds() function

Returns [Success&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.success.md) with the supplied result value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function succeeds<T>(value: T): Success<T>;
```

## Remarks

A `succeeds` alias was added in release 5.0 for naming consistency with [fails](./ts-utils.fails.md)<!-- -->, which was added to avoid conflicts with test frameworks and libraries.
